Prompt.masterLabel: Opportunity List View Tax Settings Prompt

promptVersions.body:
We have added an enhancement to give you the ability to configure Taxes at the Ledger level.



This article will explain how you can review the new Tax Settings record to ensure all values were migrated correctly, and how you can create new Tax Settings records (if needed) and associate them with each of your Ledgers.
promptVersions.masterLabel: Opportunity List View Tax Settings Prompt
promptVersions.title: Configure Tax on Ledgers
